resources.string: By: paizhangpi, Victor Jiao, 2019, 2020\nDedicated to education and internal use.\nSounds and photos by Apple.
Check out the official website for updates, comments, and other information.\npaizhang.info/MacIndex
Tap on the image to play startup and death sound.
Tap on the image to play startup sound.
Tap below to access more specifications…

MacIndex will not lunch specifications page in the future. Instead, it will redirect you to the specific EveryMac page of the model directly. 

MacIndex will ask you for specific configuration if the model has more than one configurations. 

 If you are trying "I'm Feeling Lucky", MacIndex will redirect you to a random EveryMac page directly without asking.
By default, MacIndex will play startup and death sound alternatively. However, if you would not prefer to hear death sound, you can turn it off.
By default, you can use left and right swipes to navigate between models. However, if you don\'t like this function, you can turn it off as well.
You may also enable old-fashioned navigate buttons with or without gestures.
68000-based Macintosh variations, including Compact Macintosh, Macintosh II, Macintosh LC, Quadra and Centris series.
All-in-one New world PowerPC-based Macintosh Models dedicated to low-end and education markets.
All-in-one New world PowerPC-based Macintosh Models dedicated to mainstream and family markets.
Compact New world PowerPC-based low-end Macintosh Models.
68000-or-PowerPC-based Macintosh variations that sold as bundles with existing models.
New world PowerPC-based Macintosh low-end Laptops.
More than one configurations are found for this model. Please make a selection then confirm.
Due to sale region or special purpose, this model is not available in EveryMac
Sorry, an error occurred. Please restart the app. If still not resolved, please report the error and the procedure to me.
